desc: Clinically proven high fiber snacks for weight management.

layout.text: Gut health made simple with yellow pea fiber

Meet your new favorite high fiber snacks, created with a unique and clinically proven ingredient – yellow pea fiber! Try our Oatmeal Hemp, Ginger Flax, and Cocoa Chia Cookies, the first of many yellow pea fiber products to come! Up to 30% of your daily fiber in each cookie!
